title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Tamil Nadu's Vision: Democratizing AI for All
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: McDondald's pulls AI Christmas ad after viewer backlash
description: McDonald's has taken down a Christmas ad that was completely made with artificial intelligence after receiving an onslaught of backlash.
content:
Viewers were not lovin’ it.
McDonald’s has taken down a Christmas ad that was completely made with artificial intelligence after receiving an onslaught of backlash.

title: AI: Europe and China compare their perspectives on the future of work
description: In a debate co-produced by Euronews and CGTN, researchers, economists and professionals from China and Europe compared their views on the impact of artificial intelligence on the world of work.

title: Inside Meta’s Pivot From Open Source to Money-Making AI Model
description: Meta Platforms Inc.’s Mark Zuckerberg, months into building one of the priciest teams in technology history, is getting personally involved in day-to-day work and pivoting the company’s focus to an artificial intelligence model it can make money off of.

title: AI experts warn of risks from unregulated development, urge balanced oversight
description: Experts in artificial intelligence (AI) have raised concerns over the risks of unregulated growth in the sector, emphasising the need for careful oversight to harness its potential while addressing challenges such as trust, security, and ethical use.

title: A Trump proposal could limit Michigan, other states’ AI laws
description: President Trump says he'll sign an executive order this week to federalize artificial intelligence regulation. Attorneys general in Michigan and 35 other states say it risks “disastrous consequences.”
content:
President Donald Trump said he will issue an executive order this week providing a single, national standard for artificial intelligence (AI), preempting state efforts to regulate it.

title: India, Sweden partner to kick-start 7 breakthrough decarbonisation projects in steel & cement sectors
description: India and Sweden are joining forces for a cleaner industrial future. Seven projects will explore new ways to cut emissions in steel and cement production. These initiatives aim to use hydrogen in steelmaking and recycle materials for green cement. Artificial intelligence will also support efforts to reduce carbon in cement.
